item.title: 20 Best London Travel Tips
item.description: Top 20 Things To See In London Buckingham Palace London Eye Millenium Bridge Tower of London Put some more content here and here. Talk about best areas to stay. Maybe link to some hotels. Show a basic itinerary screen shot. We could add a sign up form where they have to enter an email address, and then we can email them a sample itinerary.
